Overall signal analysisÂ¶

Where possible, modules and functions are reused between different types of signal analysis. This happens most frequently with ECG and VCG data, and infrequently with EGM data. Documentation is within the individual functions and modules, with general use cases for each signal type described in the following:

Contents:

  • ECG Analysis
    • Reading ECG data
  • EGM Analysis
    • Example data
    • Reading EGM data
    • Getting activation time
    • Getting repolarisation time
    • Getting (dV/dt)max
    • Getting QRS duration
  • VCG Analysis
    • Reading VCG data
